name: Theory and Practice of Regression Analysis
description: This is an advanced course building on MGEC11H3/(ECMC11H3). Students will master regression theory, hypothesis and diagnostic tests, and assessment of econometric results. Treatment of special statistical problems will be discussed. Intensive computer-based assignments will provide experience in estimating and interpreting regressions, preparing students for MGED50H3/(ECMD50H3). Enrolment is limited to students registered in programs requiring this course.
prerequisites: MGEB02H3/(ECMB02H3) and MGEB06H3/(ECMB06H3) and MGEB11H3/(ECMB11H3) and MGEB12H3/(ECMB12H3) and MGEC11H3/(ECMC11H3)
